card_text: 3 DARK Fairy monsters$NYour opponent cannot target Fairy monsters you control with card effects. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "The First Darklord" per turn, and only once that turn.$N●If this card is Fusion Summoned using "Darklord Morningstar" as material: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls.$N●During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 Fairy monster from your hand or GY in Defense Position.
